mapper.select: SELECT w.wit_id, p.pro_id, p.name, p.min_retail_price, p.retail_price, p.image_url FROM wishlist w JOIN product p ON w.pro_id = p.pro_id WHERE w.dsr_id=#{dsrId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO wishlist (dsr_id, pro_id, create_date, last_update_date) VALUES (#{dsrId}, #{proId}, now(), now())
